solution_line_template: At the end of Monday, there are {initial_books} - {taken_out_monday} = <<{initial_books}-{taken_out_monday}={after_monday}>>{after_monday} books left.
At the end of Tuesday, there are {after_monday} + {returned_tuesday} = <<{after_monday}+{returned_tuesday}={after_tuesday}>>{after_tuesday} books.
